sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或短语动词均表示"轻视，蔑视"之意。
means: despise ： 指由于卑鄙、软弱，渺小或无价值等而被轻视。
scorn ： 语气较强，指极端的蔑视，常伴有愤怒或恼怒的情感。
look down upon ： 指自视地位优越而蔑视他人或事。

sentence.Network_en: I can never, ever forgive him. I despise him.
sentence.Network_cn: 我永远不会原谅他。我鄙视他。
保守党右翼分子鄙视他。

sentence.Network_en: Don't cheat at examination, or your classmates will despise you.
sentence.Network_cn: 考试不要作弊, 否则同班同学会轻视你的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语四级单词集锦 D 开头_百度文库 ... desperate a. 拼死的；绝望的 despise vt. 鄙视，蔑视 despite prep. 不管，不顾▄︻┻═┳ …
虐字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 侵害;残害〖 abuse;mishandle〗 轻视;忽视〖 despise;overlook〗 灾害〖 disaster〗.
侮字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 〖abuse〗 侮辱漫骂 〖despise〗 侮辱,蔑视 〖humbug;bullyandtease〗 哄骗;侮骂戏弄.
职称英语A级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... desolate a. 荒芜的，荒凉的；孤寂的，凄凉的 despise vt. 鄙视，藐视 detach vt. 分离，拆开.

list.abs: No one will despise you ., 没有人看不起你.
...猛男背后都有一个悲剧，而这个悲剧一定是要由于他的成功和高尚而产生，并能引发优秀女性的母性爱怜本能的。despise success 晒命所谓晒命，就是对自己的成功抱以“不过如此尔尔”并且恨不得立即抛弃的的态度，当然这种态度的前提是要用最.
... All the poses,out of focus 我的姿态聚集焦点 I despise 我鄙视 Eff me over,your exposure 你的底片不断的诅咒我.
永恒的美 ... Where these are not,I despise 若非如此，我讨厌， As old Time makes these decay, 一旦朱颜被岁月掳劫，.
小除夕 English, 翻译, 例句,... ... 小球腔菌属 leptosphaeria 小觑 to have contempt for;to despise 小声 in a low voice.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French despire, from Latin despicere, from de- 'down' + specere 'look at'

entry.def: If you despise something or someone, you dislike them and have a very low opinion of them.

example.ex: I can never, ever forgive him. I despise him...
example.tran: 我永远不会原谅他。我鄙视他。
她暗地里瞧不起他的工作。

sentences.sentence: "He despises the people he has to work for"
"The professor scorns the students who don't catch on immediately"

auth_sentence.content: I so despise ignorance for the sake of been ignorant.
auth_sentence.res_content: I so despise ignorance for the sake of been ignorant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I so despise ignorance for the sake of been ignorant.

auth_sentence.content: The moment he talks he makes some other Englishman despise him.
auth_sentence.res_content: The moment he talks he makes some other Englishman despise him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The moment he talks he makes some other Englishman despise him.

auth_sentence.content: Hatred of quacks may lead us to despise the true healers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hatred of quacks may lead us to despise the true healers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hatred of quacks may lead us to despise the true healers.

stems_affixes.word_buile: con大家+spic看+uous……的→大家都看见→显眼的
de向下+spic看+able能……的→能向下看的→可鄙视的
per全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼
sus下面+spic看+ious……的→在下面看的→suspicious怀疑的
suspicious[adj.[of]可疑的,多疑的,疑心的]+ly表副词→adv.猜疑着, 怀疑着
sus下面+spic看+ion表名词→在下面看→suspicion怀疑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不管, 尽管, 不论
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉+spite=spic看→不看→不管, 尽管

means.word_mean: 鄙视, 看不起某人(某事)

sentences.en: Honest boys despise lies and liars.
sentences.cn: 诚实的孩子鄙视谎言和说谎者。

jushi.english: Honest boys despise lies and liars.
jushi.chinese: 诚实的孩子鄙视谎言和说谎者。
